actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to provide that the United States District Court for the Central District of California shall be held at Santa Ana, California, in addition to the place currently provided by law.

summary.text: Directs that the United States District Court for the Central District of California shall be held at Santa Ana as well as Los Angeles.

titles.title: A bill to provide that the United States District Court for the Central District of California shall be held at Santa Ana, California, in addition to the place currently provided by law.
